New Records: Jeffery Vandersay recorded his first six-wicket haul in ODIs, taking 10-0-33-6
Key Match Events: India's batting collapsed after Rohit Sharma's dismissal, losing key players quickly
Sri Lanka dismissed Virat Kohli and Shreyas Iyer in successive overs, turning the game around
Dunith Wellalage and Kamindu Mendis formed a crucial 72-run partnership for Sri Lanka
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a surface offering grip and turn, aiding spinners
Sri Lankan spinners have historically performed well against India in ODIs
